description:
Dragon Age: The Veilguard has finally been revealed and the fanbase is split. As for me, I think it looks promising! But there's still so much I need to know. What did you think of the Dragon Age: The Veilguard gameplay demo?

#dragonagetheveilguard #dragonage #dragonageinquisition

title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is NOT What I Expected
